title: Business Programming
description: An introduction to the basic concepts and skills of software programming and their applications to solving business problems.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: CS 1371 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CS 1315 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CS 1331 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CS 1301 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
